item.text: The Lord said to Jeremiah:
“Stand in the gate of the Lord’s temple and proclaim this message: ‘Listen to the Lord’s message, all you people of Judah who have passed through these gates to worship the Lord.
The Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says: Change the way you have been living and do what is right. If you do, I will allow you to continue to live in this land.
Stop putting your confidence in the false belief that says, “We are safe! The temple of the Lord is here! The temple of the Lord is here! The temple of the Lord is here!”

You <st data-num="03588 0518 03190">must</st> <st data-num="03190" class="">change</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> you have been <st data-num="04611" class="">living</st> <st data-num="03190" class="">and do what is right</st>. You <st data-num="0518 06213">must</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">treat</st> <st data-num="0996 0376">one</st> <st data-num="0996 07453">another</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">fairly</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="03808" class="">Stop</st> <st data-num="06231" class="">oppressing</st> <st data-num="01616" class="">resident foreigners</st> who live in your land, <st data-num="03490" class="">children who have lost</st> their <st data-num="03490" class="">fathers</st>, and <st data-num="0490" class="">women who have lost</st> their <st data-num="0490" class="">husbands</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0408" class="">Stop</st> <st data-num="08210" class="">killing</st> <st data-num="05355" class="">innocent</st> <st data-num="01818" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">land</st>. <st data-num="03808" class="">Stop</st> <st data-num="0310 01980">paying allegiance to</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>. That will only bring about your <st data-num="07451" class="">ruin</st>.<n id="4" />
If you stop doing these things, I will allow you to continue to live in this land that I gave to your ancestors as a lasting possession.
“‘But just look at you! You are putting your confidence in a false belief that will not deliver you.

You <st data-num="01589" class="">steal</st>.<n id="1" /> You <st data-num="07523" class="">murder</st>. You <st data-num="05003" class="">commit adultery</st>. You <st data-num="08267" class="">lie</st> when you <st data-num="07650" class="">swear on oath</st>. You <st data-num="06999" class="">sacrifice</st> to the god <st data-num="01168" class="">Baal</st>. You <st data-num="01980 0310">pay allegiance to</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> previously <st data-num="03045" class="">known</st>.

Then you <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="05975" class="">stand</st> in my <st data-num="06440" class="">presence</st> in <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="0834 08034">I</st> have <st data-num="07121 05921">claimed as</st> my <st data-num="07121 05921">own</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, “We <st data-num="05337" class="">are safe</st>!” You think you are <st data-num="04616" class="">so</st> safe <st data-num="04616" class="">that</st> you go on <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">those</st> <st data-num="08441" class="">hateful sins</st>!<n id="2" />
Do you think this temple I have claimed as my own is to be a hideout for robbers? You had better take note! I have seen for myself what you have done! says the Lord.

<st data-num="03588" class="">So</st>, <st data-num="01980 04994">go</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04725 0834">place</st> in <st data-num="07887" class="">Shiloh</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> I <st data-num="07931" class="">allowed</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">myself</st> <st data-num="07931" class="">to be worshiped</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="07223" class="">early days</st>. <st data-num="07200" class="">See</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> to it<n id="2" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="07451" class="">wicked things</st> my <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> did.
You also have done all these things, says the Lord, and I have spoken to you over and over again. But you have not listened! You have refused to respond when I called you to repent!

So I will <st data-num="06213" class="">destroy</st> this <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="07121 05921">claimed as</st> my <st data-num="07121 05921">own</st>,<n id="1" /> this temple <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="0982" class="">trusting</st> to protect you. I will destroy this <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> to you and your <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st>,<n id="2" /> just <st data-num="0834" class="">like</st> I <st data-num="06213" class="">destroyed</st> <st data-num="07887" class="">Shiloh</st>.<n id="3" />
And I will drive you out of my sight just like I drove out your relatives, the people of Israel.’
“But as for you, Jeremiah, do not pray for these people. Do not raise a cry of prayer for them! Do not plead with me to save them, because I will not listen to you.

<st data-num="0369" class="">Do</st> you <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">towns</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and in the <st data-num="02351" class="">streets</st> of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>?<n id="2" />

<st data-num="01121" class="">Children</st> are <st data-num="03950" class="">gathering</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">firewood</st>, <st data-num="01" class="">fathers</st> are <st data-num="01197" class="">building</st> <st data-num="0784" class="">fires</st> with it, and <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st> are <st data-num="03888" class="">mixing</st> <st data-num="01217" class="">dough</st> to <st data-num="06213" class="">bake</st> <st data-num="03561" class="">cakes</st> to offer to the goddess they call the <st data-num="04446" class="">Queen</st> of <st data-num="08064" class="">Heaven</st>.<n id="1" /> They are also <st data-num="05258" class="">pouring out</st> <st data-num="05262" class="">drink offerings</st> to <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>. They seem to do all this <st data-num="04616" class="">just</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="03707" class="">trouble</st> me.
But I am not really the one being troubled! says the Lord. Rather they are bringing trouble on themselves to their own shame!

So, the Sovereign Lord says, my raging fury will be poured out on this land. It will be poured out on human beings and animals, on trees and crops. And it will burn like a fire that cannot be extinguished.
“The Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says to the people of Judah: ‘You might as well go ahead and add the meat of your burnt offerings to that of the other sacrifices and eat it, too!

<st data-num="03588" class="">Consider this</st>:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">When</st> I <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">to</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">after</st> I <st data-num="03318" class="">brought</st> them <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st> of <st data-num="0776 04714">Egypt</st>, I did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> merely <st data-num="06680" class="">give</st> them <st data-num="06680" class="">commands</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">about</st> <st data-num="01697 05930">burnt offerings</st> and <st data-num="01697 02077">sacrifices</st>.

I <st data-num="03588 0518">also</st> <st data-num="01697 02088">explicitly</st> <st data-num="06680 0559">commanded</st> them:<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="08085" class="">Obey</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">me</st>. If you do, I<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> and <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> my <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>. <st data-num="01980" class="">Live</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">exactly</st> the <st data-num="01870 0834">way</st> I <st data-num="06680" class="">tell</st> you<n id="3" /> <st data-num="04616" class="">and</st> things will <st data-num="03190" class="">go well</st> with you.”

But they did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> to me <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="05186" class="">pay</st> any <st data-num="0241" class="">attention</st> to me. They <st data-num="01980" class="">followed</st> the <st data-num="08307" class="">stubborn</st> <st data-num="04156" class="">inclinations</st> of their own <st data-num="07451" class="">wicked</st> <st data-num="03820" class="">hearts</st>. They <st data-num="01961" class="">acted</st> <st data-num="0268" class="">worse and worse</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">instead of</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">better</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="04480" class="">From</st> the <st data-num="03117 0834">time</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">departed</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="03117 02088">now</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> my <st data-num="03605 05650">servants</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you <st data-num="07925 07971">again and again</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03117" class="">day after day</st>.<n id="3" />
But your ancestors did not listen to me nor pay attention to me. They became obstinate and were more wicked than even their own forefathers.’”
Then the Lord said to me, “When you tell them all this, they will not listen to you. When you call out to them, they will not respond to you.
So tell them: ‘This is a nation that has not obeyed the Lord their God and has not accepted correction. Faithfulness is nowhere to be found in it. These people do not even profess it anymore.

So mourn, you people of this nation. Cut off your hair and throw it away. Sing a song of mourning on the hilltops. For the Lord has decided to reject and forsake this generation that has provoked his wrath!’”

The Lord says, “I have rejected them because the people of Judah have done what I consider evil. They have set up their disgusting idols in the temple that I have claimed for my own and have defiled it.

They have also <st data-num="01129" class="">built</st> <st data-num="01116" class="">places of worship</st><n id="1" /> in a place called <st data-num="08612 0834">Topheth</st><n id="2" /> in the <st data-num="01516" class="">Valley</st> of <st data-num="01121" class="">Ben</st> <st data-num="02011" class="">Hinnom</st> so that they can <st data-num="08313" class="">sacrifice</st> their <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> and <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> by <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>. That is <st data-num="0834" class="">something</st> I <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> them to do! Indeed, it <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> even <st data-num="05927 05921">entered</st> my <st data-num="03820" class="">mind</st> to command such a thing!<n id="3" />

So, watch out!” says the Lord. “The time will soon come when people will no longer call those places Topheth or the Valley of Ben Hinnom. But they will call that valley the Valley of Slaughter, and they will bury so many people in Topheth that they will run out of room.

Then the <st data-num="05038" class="">dead bodies</st> of <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> left on the ground for the <st data-num="05775 08064">birds</st> and <st data-num="0776" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st> to <st data-num="03978" class="">eat</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0369" class="">There will not be</st> any survivors to <st data-num="02729" class="">scare</st> them <st data-num="02729" class="">away</st>.

I will put an end to the sounds of joy and gladness or the glad celebration of brides and grooms throughout the towns of Judah and the streets of Jerusalem. For the whole land will become a desolate wasteland.”
